recipesJson.name: Simple Mango Menthol
recipesJson.author: photohap
recipesJson.description: I am not really a fan of mango juices, they usually come out to harsh.  This juice however is not harsh at all.  At 6% the mango is just right and the lemon lime is just there to enhance the profile.  No sweetener is needed.  The menthol and koolada are more on the exhale, if you want more coolness I would bump up the menthol, not the koolada.  This is not a shake and vape, I would give it at least 2 days to start coming together.
